DOC.detailed_description: In study adult patient normal abnormal middle ear document tympanogram test detect Levator Veli Palatini ( mLVP ) tensor Veli Palatini ( mTVP ) electromyographic ( EMG ) activity correspond eustachian tube ( ET ) open rest . The subject mix without ET dysfunction ( ETD ) . Tests conduct audiology unit tertiary care center locate near sea level , constant atmospheric pressure temperature . Subjects select randomly without eustachian tube dysfunction ( ETD ) use questionnaire evaluate tympanometry tympanic air exchange test external ear canal test ET opening . Monopolar reference needle electrode muscle insert transpalatally test side without topical anesthetic . Tympanic air exchange test do placing pressure sensor external ear canal patient well nasal pressure sensor detect ET opening EMG record . Information receive ear pressure nasal pressure sensor tympanic air exchange sensor ( TAS ) equipment use assess swallow efficacy healthy subject . DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients select outpatient visit Department Otolaryngology Haseki Hospital mixture healthy Eustachian tube Eustachian Tube Dysfunction problem agree participate study inform sign consent form . Questionnaire ( ETDQ7 ) use initial determination without ET dysfunction problem include sufficient number patient ETD problem batch . Exclusion criterion : All subject examination tympanic membrane , middle ear , nasal cavity nasopharynx . Patients severe septal deformity , nasal polyp turbinate hypertrophy , adenoid nasopharyngeal mass exclude . Patients upper respiratory tract infection , acute otitis medium , tympanosclerosis , otosclerosis previous ear surgery include study group .
